title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials using Supabase authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
User is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that the login process fails gracefully when invalid credentials are provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
User is shown an error message indicating login failure.

title: User Logout Successfully
description: Verify that authenticated users can log out and are redirected to the login page.

steps.description: Authenticate and navigate to dashboard.
Click logout button.
User session ends and user is redirected to login page.

title: Client Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a user can register a new client with all required and valid information.

steps.description: Navigate to clients management page.
Open new client registration form.
Fill in valid client data including name, contact information, and vehicle details.
Submit the registration form.
New client record is created and visible in the clients list.

title: Client Registration with Missing Required Fields
description: Verify the system validates required fields and prevents client registration when mandatory data is missing.

steps.description: Navigate to clients management page.
Open new client registration form.
Leave mandatory fields empty and submit the form.
Validation errors are shown indicating missing required fields.

title: Create New Service with Complete Data
description: Verify that a service can be created with client, vehicle, service value, commission, observations and that commission is calculated automatically.

steps.description: Navigate to service management page.
Open new service creation form.
Fill client, vehicle, value, commission percentage, additional observations.
Submit the form.
Service is created and commission value is correctly calculated and displayed.

title: Service Creation with Invalid Commission Percentage
description: Validate that service creation fails or warns if commission percentage is invalid (e.g., negative or over 100%).

steps.description: Navigate to service management page.
Open new service creation form.
Enter a negative or greater than 100% commission percentage.
Attempt to submit form.
Validation error is displayed preventing submission.

title: Record Expense with Due Date and Categorization
description: Verify that an expense can be recorded specifying due date, amount, category, and payment status.

steps.description: Navigate to expense management page.
Open new expense form.
Fill in amount, due date, category, and payment status.
Submit the form.
Expense recorded and visible in the list with correct details.

title: Update Commission Status to Received
description: Verify that commission status can be updated from pending to received and the history is tracked correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to commission control page.
Select a commission entry with pending status.
Update status to received.
Commission status changes to received and history shows the update timestamp.

title: Display Dashboard Metrics and Graphs
description: Verify dashboard shows up-to-date financial metrics, client counts, services completed and commission data with proper graphs.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the home dashboard.
Dashboard metrics and charts load within 3 seconds with accurate data.
Graphs respond correctly to data and display labels clearly.

title: Generate Financial Report with Date Filters
description: Verify financial reports can be generated filtered by date ranges and other criteria, and export as PDF.

steps.description: Navigate to reports module.
Select date range and other filters.
Generate report.
Report loads within 5 seconds showing correct filtered data.
Click export to PDF.
PDF file downloads and matches displayed report content.

title: Trigger Automatic Backup and Export JSON File
description: Verify that backup operation exports current data as a JSON file with full data integrity validation.

steps.description: Navigate to backup module.
Trigger automatic data backup.
Backup JSON file is generated and available for download.
Backup file content is validated for data completeness and integrity.

title: Import Data from Valid Backup JSON
description: Verify that data can be imported successfully from a valid backup JSON file restoring system state.

steps.description: Navigate to import data dialog.
Upload a valid backup JSON file.
Confirm import.
System imports data correctly, updates views, and no data loss occurs.

title: Reject Import from Corrupted or Invalid JSON
description: Verify system detects invalid or corrupted JSON backup files and prevents import with user feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to import data dialog.
Upload a corrupted or invalid JSON file.
System shows clear error message and blocks import.

title: Responsive Interface on Desktop, Tablet and Mobile
description: Verify UI renders correctly and navigation works seamlessly across desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Access system on desktop with large screen.
UI elements are well-aligned, navigation sidebar visible, interactions work as expected.
Access system on tablet with medium screen size.
UI adapts layout properly; navigation remains intuitive and accessible.
Access system on mobile device with small screen.
UI collapses navigation to hamburger menu; content is readable and usable; no overflow or horizontal scrolling.

title: Theme Switching Between Light and Dark Modes
description: Verify that user can switch interface theme between light and dark modes and that toast notifications adapt accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to any page with theme switch.
Switch theme to dark mode.
UI theme changes to dark mode and remains consistent across pages.
Trigger a toast notification.
Toast notification appearance matches current theme.
Switch theme back to light mode.
UI theme changes back to light mode and notifications adapt accordingly.

title: Navigation via Sidebar and Header
description: Verify users can navigate between modules (clients, services, expenses, commissions, reports, backup) using sidebar and header menu consistently.

steps.description: Login and open main interface.
Use sidebar links to navigate to each module.
Each module loads correctly and state updates accordingly.
Use header navigation controls to traverse modules.
Navigation works seamlessly without errors or page reload issues.

title: System Performance Under Load
description: Verify system performance meets requirements: page loads under 3 seconds, reports generate under 5 seconds, and navigation is fluid.

steps.description: Measure load time of dashboard.
Dashboard loads completely in less than 3 seconds.
Generate a financial report with filters.
Report generation completes in less than 5 seconds.
Navigate rapidly between different modules.
Navigation is smooth without lag or delays.

title: Clear and Helpful Error Messages
description: Verify error messages shown to users for failures such as invalid inputs, failed backups, login errors are clear and informative.

steps.description: Cause a form validation error by submitting empty required fields.
Validation error messages clearly indicate the issue and how to fix.
Attempt to login with incorrect credentials.
Error message shows invalid credentials hint.
Attempt to export backup with simulated storage error.
Error notification explains backup failure with recovery steps.

title: Session Persistence After Authentication
description: Verify that user sessions persist after login and remain active across page reloads and short periods of inactivity.

steps.description: Log in successfully.
Reload the web page.
User remains logged in and session data is preserved.
Wait for short inactivity period.
User session remains active and accessible without re-login.

title: Access Control Enforcement for Protected Routes
description: Verify that unauthenticated users cannot access protected modules and are redirected to login page.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate directly to a protected page (eg: /services) without login.
System redirects to login page preventing access.
